employees.name: David Dogperson
employees.info: We are happy to have David on our team! David moved to Nashville in 2017 from North Carolina, where he helped to raise his family's 9 dogs.

employees.name: Susan Susanite
employees.info: Susan is a joy to have on our team! She loves dogs, kittens, and Super Mario.

employees.name: John Dogson
employees.info: John is our least favorite employee. He's always making customers uncomfortable, but he's the owner's nephew and we can't fire him. He hates dogs.
